meanings.definition: A system of society or government ruled by a woman or women.
meanings.sent1: In some matriarchies, women make important decisions for the community.
meanings.sent2: Historically, matriarchies have existed in various cultures around the world.
meanings.sent3: The matriarchies in this story always have the best ideas for solving problems.
meanings.sent4: Her leadership style turned the company into a matriarchies, where everyone respected her authority.
meanings.sent5: The matriarchies of the elephant herd led the group with wisdom and strength.

meanings.definition: The women who are the oldest or most powerful members of a family or group.
meanings.sent1: The matriarchies of the family gathered to discuss important matters.
meanings.sent2: She was considered the matriarchies of the community due to her experience and knowledge.
meanings.sent3: The matriarchies of the book club always chose the most interesting novels to read.
meanings.sent4: As the matriarchies of the team, she guided the younger members with care and wisdom.
meanings.sent5: Her role as the matriarchies of the group made her a respected and admired figure.
